column9: I loved Vioxx!  I was on the max dose for three years without any problems what so ever. I was very fortunate that I did not have any adverse effects while using it. I am on the max dose of Celebrex and it only lasts about 18-20 hours. I often wake in my RA pain.  Vioxx lasted 30 hours and was just wonderful for me.

column9: I had a broken leg and a rod put in my left femer. Now after 7 years the clot has broken up and my whole leg is swolen sore and black and blue and am being checked to see if it traveling to my lungs. I am a very active 43 year old women with 4 kids. I only weigh 115 lbs and work 2 jobs. I play softball and ride horses regularly. So the person who said they would probably have the same problems without even taking vioxx is very ignorant. column2: Daddy T, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Caregiver)
column9: Vioxx dramatically relieved my joint pain and inflammation more than any other medication I've tried. It's sad that the few people that had negative effects were able to sue this product out of the hands of the many who were helped using it. I'm sure if each negatively affected person's case could have been studied on an individual basis there would be other contributing factors causing results such as stroke and other cardiovascular problems without linking them to Vioxx. In other words those individuals who had cardiovascular complications most likely would have experienced them even if they had never taken Vioxx. When the courts, lacking medical expertise, decide that huge settlements should be awarded to pacify people wanting millions for their unfortunate disbilities good medicine and treatment options are taken away.
